Task: Approve Conflict of Interest policy and collect annual disclosures
Description: Adopt policy, distribute disclosure form to all directors and officers, file signed forms.

Task: Create Donation Acceptance and Gift Acknowledgment policy
Description: Template receipt language with 501(c)(3) pending disclaimer until determination letter arrives.

Task: Adopt Document Retention and Destruction policy
Description: Define retention periods for board minutes, finance, HR, and program records.
Define spending thresholds, dual‑signature rules, reimbursement process, and bookkeeping cadence. Document in Policy.
Bring EIN letter, Articles, Bylaws, and board resolution authorizing signers.
File before fundraising to comply with state solicitation laws. Track renewal due date annually.

Task: Review SPV and fiscal sponsorship agreements
Description: Confirm alignment with mission, independence, and compliance requirements.
Circulate final draft to board. Vote to adopt. Upload signed copy to Document Inventory and record adoption in minutes.
Decide filing type, calendar the deadline, and assign preparer.
Public page linking Articles, Bylaws, board roster, key policies, and financial summaries.
